name: "Sugarcoated: Uncover Scotland's Role in the Transatlantic Slave Trade"
name_original: "Sugarcoated: Uncover Scotland's Role in the Transatlantic Slave Trade"
description: Sugarcoated is an educational, text based, puzzle game aimed to teach players about the transatlantic slave trade in the 17th-19th century, with particular focus on Scottish involvement. Use the truth to find freedom!
